items.text: full on leg, and driven to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: swing and a miss
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: stays in his crease to punch this to wide long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: another dart, but he goes deep in his crease to push it to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: slog-swept for six too full and he was down on one knee, picked it up well and deposited it over deep square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, SIX runs

items.text: very full outside off and driven through cover with a free-flowing bat. but there is protection in the deep, so only a single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: dips on him and goes with the arm, Hope comes forward to defend, but is struck on the pads
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: goes back and flat-bats this to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller, pushed to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: leading edge popped in the air towards short mid-on, but no one there. He was going back to flick but the turn did him in
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: oooh that skidded on. Had to bring his bat down in a hurry to jab it away
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, no run

items.text: stays back and punches this to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length ball on the stumps, he moves back and tucks it to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: turn from off, and he beats the outside edge of the batsman's prodding bat. But the keeper can't hold on either and they take a bye
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 bye

items.text: fuller on the stumps, mistimes his drive back to the bowler
items.postText: PrashantBanjare: "spinners once again pegging back the Windies and this is the main concern for them as soon as the spinners come they struggled to rotate the strike and pressure mounts and they go for big shots which brings their downfall. They should learn to play the ball with soft hands and look for quick single as most teams do"
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: dropped by the keeper. This was drifting down leg and he wnet for the sweep, got a thin glove on it and Mushfiqur grassed it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: goes back to punch it to the bowler's left
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: stays in his crease and lets the ball come to him before driving it past the bowler to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: goes back and shows the full face of the bat, pushing the ball to long on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: flatter on off, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: getting some turn into the batsman from outside off, he stays deep in his crease to punch to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: straigther one that time, but they're going back deep to read him off the pitch when he pitches on a length and that allows him to push it to long on for another single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: comes forward to this flighted one and squirts it towards point off a thick outside edge
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: stays back and cuts this to third man
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run
